text: El Asalto ("") is a 1960 Argentine black-and-white film crime drama directed and by Kurt Land. The film was based on a book by Enrique Silberstein and premiered in Buenos Aires. It starred Alberto de Mendoza. ==Plot== A group of mobsters plan a bank heist. But the rehearsal of the robbery is plenty of personal drama, disputes an almost farcical mishaps. ==Main cast== *Alberto de Mendoza...The Boss *Egle Martin *Luis Tasca *Tato Bores *Osvaldo Terranova *Thelma del Río *Argentino Ledesma *Mario Lozano *Héctor Méndez *Irma Gabriel ==Other cast== *Osvaldo María Cabrera *Víctor Catalano *José De Angelis .... Superintendent Oliva *Conrado Diana *Ángel Díaz *Rolando Dumas .... Francisco Coba *Mariquita Gallegos .... Woman in disco *Claudia Lapacó .... Woman in disco *René Lester *Pablo Moret *Miguel Paparelli .... The Usher *Gilberto Peyret .... Sanz *María Esther Rodrigo *Carlos Roig *Félix Tortorelli ....
